column1: Iran threw everything they had at the USA
column2: but the Americans overall had more quality and deserved the win. They particularily dominated in the first half
column3: and were able to find their sole goal in the 38th minute through Pulisic. Iran looked a much better side in the second half
column4: with Rezaeian especially showing a lot of quality on the right-hand side
column5: but they ultimately could not get a chance past Turner.

column1: 38'	GOOOOAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLL!!!!! You can't say it hasn't been coming. The USA have been all over Iran
column2: and they have finally got the ball in the back of the net. McKennie with a good ball to Dest
column3: who heads it into the path of America's star man Pulisic to score. Iran 0-1 United States!
